nodes.text: Puttana Pin was a hunt saboteur hired to intercept the skip tracer Shesslaria and rescue her target during the Imperial Era. However, Pin crashed on the desert moon Jedha. Pin believed the desert sun would be detrimental to their physiology and recorded the details of the crash in the logbook Smuggler's Guide, which had previously been in the possession of Shesslaria. Cycyed Ock later came across the crash site, prying the logbook from the burnt remains of Pin.
